scriptLines: select1 filter(facility == 'T-A~Annandale T-A-Registered for PCC (for iTreatMD only), T-A~Global-Active Wound Patients' || facility == 'T-A~Annandale T-A-Registered for PCC (for iTreatMD only), T-A~Global-Active Wound Patients') ~> filter1
